result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Due to the defendant's incarceration status, and that he will be sent to Indiana to serve sentence once all time is served in Wisconsin, the court is WAIVING the payment of all costs, fees and assessments. Defendant is to provide DNA sample and that cost is waived also. Defendant remanded.
Consecutive to: any other sentence and consecutive to 15CF2679, with 0 days credit.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Tyrone Wilson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements to the court by all parties.  Additional statement by Galene M.    The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 8 months in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence and consecutive to 15CF2679, with credit for 0 days time served.  Due to the defendant's incarceration status, and that he will be sent to Indiana to serve sentence once all time is served in Wisconsin, the court is WAIVING the payment of all costs, fees and assessments.  Defendant is to provide DNA sample and that cost is waived also.
Defendant remanded.

Attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub in court, defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson not in court, in custody.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant at Dodge and not produced; state will complete OTP for next date of 10-29-2015.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 29, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  As to count 1:   Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
As to count 2: court orders count dismissed and read in for sentencing.
Defendant remanded pending sentencing on 10-2-2015.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 2, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub in court, defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson not in court, in custody.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for final pre-trial.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial in Branch 38 on 09/21/2015.

Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  Nicolas J Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant's appearance is waived for today's date.  
Medical records have been provided to defense today.  The state is requesting that all cases 15CF2679, 15CM1818, and 15CM2331 be joined for trial which is GRANTED by the court.  Defendant has a pending Armed Robbery case (15CF3013) set for plea/sentencing in Branch 21 on 9-15-2015.  The court will set these matters for another final pretrial on 9-10-2015.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub for Attorney Greg Renden.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Motion of the defense counsel, Greg Renden, to withdraw granted by the Court. Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND. Motion Hearing on 8/20/2015 vacated. Case adjourned to branch 38.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:15 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Motion to Withdraw as Counsel for the defendant filed.  Motion to be heard on 8-10-2015.  Defendant in custody at CJF.

Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Gregory A. Renden.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared on behalf of Nicolas Heitman for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND. Due to Chief Judge directive, case reassigned to Judge Flanagan, branch 4, to follow ADA assigned to case. Court ordered case adjourned to branch 4. Parties are advised that EFFECTIVE August 3, 2015, this case will be assigned to JUDGE WAGNER, BRANCH 38, in Room 504 in the Courthouse. Court ordered case scheduled for Status Conference/Motion Hearing in branch 38.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE POINT for Supervision.
Court orders defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY and to be monitored by drug tests and portable breathalyzers.  
Court orders no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. 
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Imogene W; Galene M.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in court with attorney Gregory A. Renden.  Defendant Michael Tyrone Wilson in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.   Defense request to  withhold plea. Court enters a Plea of Not Guilty on behalf of defendant, preserving his right of substitution.  

DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Status conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Tyrone Wilson
Current: 2535 N 16th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 07-07-2015)
Prior: 1017 West Keefe Avenue, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
